TextView.android:text: Government polytechnic Gopalganj, a new name in technical institution in North Bihar. It is established by government of Bihar department of Science and Technology 23 April 1994. It is situated in Gopalgang District. Polytechnic has a big magnificent building. It is expanded in a lush green land of 20 acres. It is far away from hue and cry of cities and their unhealthy populated environment. The big campus is in lap of nature. The river Gandak flows beside the campus.

Government Polytechnic Gopalganj is a full-fledged Govt. Institution in the Deptt. of Science and Technology, Govt. of Bihar and is bound to function as such. However in Academic and related areas it has to be responsive and participants in the decisions and deliberations of All India Council for Technical Education and other apex bodies like Indian School for Technical Education, Technical Teachers Training Institutes etc. ensuring innovations in Pedagogical and practical aspects of Technical Education. The Administration and Management of the Institute are oriented to these ends too.
